sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

const Button = ({isSave}) => {
  return (
    {isSave} === true ?
    <button className = "rounded text-white font-semibold bg-green-400 hover: bg-green-700  py-2 px-6 mr-4">
        Save
    </button>
    :
    <button className = "rounded text-white font-semibold bg-red-400 hover: bg-red-700  py-2 px-6 mr-4">
        Delete
    </button>
  )
}

export default Button
